thread.title: Perfect place for a stop in New York -
thread.title_full: Perfect place for a stop in New York - Review of Kimpton Muse Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Jacqui P
title: Perfect place for a stop in New York -
text:
Perfectly placed for Times Square and very close to lots of restaurants and bars, very friendly and helpful staff one of the ladies in reception even tried to fix my glasses for me which had inconveniently broken. The bedroom and bathroom were decorated lovely and quite spacious and the complimentary toiletries smelt amazing the bed was very comfortable , we were on a high floor so heard very little noise which in a very busy city was quite amazing.
I would definitely stay here again.
